title: France panorama. [No. 70/50]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. France and Poland - the official visit of Prime Minister Chaban-Delmas. 2. Roger Taillibert: architecture and sports - a foremost specialist of modern sports installations. 3. The century of Rembrandt - the Rembrandt Exhibition at the Petit Palais. 4. The Paris region, foremost French industrial center - the wide gamut of industries being set up in the Paris region.
